Sarge: A spider? If a spider killed your parents, then they sucked and shou=
ld have died. And spiders are only ugly to people who try to THINK they hav=
e beauty themselves.

Sarge breaks out laughing suddenly, as if he had told=
 a funny joke.

Perplex: What's so funny about that? Insults are funny to y=
ou?

Perplex walked up beside Sarge, then turned and looked into his eyes, =
standing right in front of him,

Perplex: Insulting a little girl is your i=
dea of funny?

Sarge: No, they are not. I was laughing because of death. I =
like death. Nobody is innocent, not even children. Deemos says he wants to =
kill the innocents. He's have to kill everyone, then, because there really =
are no innocents, except for the dead.. Get out of my face before I make yo=
u an innocent.

Perplex was unable to find any words. He was convinced that=
 this guy was insane.

Perplex: We don't act like that around here.

Sarge:=
 That is why you lose.

Again Perplex was unable to find anything to say...=

 =
 fix my mind... but I don't know why... do you know why? did that 
  spider=
 make that I hated Maximals? Before I met that spider I didn't 
  hate maxi=
mal, my mom and dad were maximals, did the spider do that? 
  uh? "
